name: Moonshade
description: A silvery leaf that enhances night vision and alertness.

name: Bloodroot
description: A red-rooted herb used for healing wounds and boosting energy.

name: Nightbloom
description: A glowing flower that only blooms under the moon. Great for potions.

name: Sageleaf
description: Common herb used in calming brews and minor healing remedies.

name: Wolfsbane
description: Extremely toxic if ingested; can be used for traps or poisons.

name: Sunpetal
description: Golden herb known for energizing tired warriors during patrols.

name: Whisperroot
description: Enhances a cat's ability to listen and detect hidden enemies.
